definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
non-ferrous metals (all metals excluding iron, chromium, manganese and their alloys)
ferrous metals (i.e. iron, chromium, manganese and alloys containing them)
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
symphonic metal (pop music)/heavy metal with symphonic pretensions

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: Most importantly, this album has a stamp of Metallica written all over it.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，这张专辑的邮票金属书面所有权。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to methods and structures for the metallization of semiconductor devices.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及半导体器件的金属化的方法和结构。

sentences.english: The rain drummed loudly on the metal roof.
sentences.chinese: 雨点敲击金属屋顶，发出很大的声响。

sentences.english: They are able to cut through metal and are nearly impossible to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以切割金属，也几乎无法摧毁。

sentences.english: Those metal utensils are jingling as the car bumps along.
sentences.chinese: 颠簸，那些金属器皿在玎珰作响。

sentences.english: It consists of a simmering metal pot of stock at the center of the dining table.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个金属罐酝酿的股票为中心的餐桌。

sentences.english: This black metal plate is called a collector.
sentences.chinese: 这块黑色金属板被称为集热器。

sentences.english: It is the heavy metals contained in the waste effluent that can cause an environmental or disposal problem.
sentences.chinese: 就是流出废液中的重金属能导致环境或处理问题。

sentences.english: The calculated results of energy gap on alkaline earth mixed halides are reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 对碱土金属复卤化物的能隙进行了计算，结果合理。
适合极薄之金属材料的熔接。

sentences.english: There may even be some wire or nylon biting into the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可能有一些金属丝或者尼龙线勒到肉里。

sentences.english: Yongkang Gushan Third Metal Die-casting Factory.
sentences.chinese: 永康市古山第三金属压铸厂。

sentences.english: At room temperature all the metals are paramagnetic.
sentences.chinese: 在室温时，所有的金属都是顺磁性的。

sentences.english: Objective Evaluate the effect of removable die(RD) on the marginal fidelity of the metal full crown.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价活动代型对金属全冠邻面边缘适合性的影响。

sentences.english: For me, reading about chemo brain has resurrected that faint taste of metal.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，读到化疗脑使我重新想起了金属味。

definition: ferrous metals (i.e. iron, chromium, manganese and alloys containing them)
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
